whdnotifier_config_help.message: Select extension options (right-click the WHD Notifier icon) to configure the connection to your Web Help Desk server.

whdnotifier_description.message: Displays Web Help Desk ticket count in toolbar. (Requires Web Help Desk 10.0.8 or later.)

whdnotifier_invalid_config.message: Invalid configuration. You must provide a Login URL or Hosted Account #, but not both. (See extension options.)

whdnotifier_missing_username_or_password.message: To enable the badge count, you must provide a tech username and password.

whdnotifier_url_missing_adaptor.message: Your login URL appears to be incorrect. Login URLs typically contain either "/helpdesk/WebObjects/" or "/cgi-bin/WebObjects/".

whdnotifier_url_missing_proto.message: Your Login URL appears to be incorrect. Login URLs should begin with "http://" or "https://".

whdnotifier_url_missing_woa.message: Your Login URL appears to be incorrect. Login URLs typically end with ".woa".
